participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emma enjoys expressing herself through various crafts and baking.
participant_1.background: i've a dogs. i love to bake cookies. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and confident, James has a strong drive to succeed in the business world.
participant_2.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i plan to go to business school next year.
